ai_output_type.description:
The desired output type of the field. It will try to force the response of the prompt to match it.

* `text` - text
* `choice` - choice

ai_temperature.description: Between 0 and 2, adjusts response randomnessâ€”lower values yield focused answers, while higher values increase creativity.

ai_prompt.description: The prompt that must run for each row. Must be an formula.

ai_file_field_id.description: File field that will be used as a knowledge base for the AI model.
